description: Alterations to front elevation fenestration involving replacement of door; retention of four new side windows to side elevation; removal of six air conditioning units to side elevation; retention of alteration to roof of ground floor rear extension; retention of alterations to materials of walls of ground floor rear extension
decision_conditions: The six air conditioning units to the side elevation shall be removed from the site within 3 months of the date of this permission and the failure to comply within this time frame will make this planning permission invalid.
Reason: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).
| The development hereby approved shall be retained out in accordance with drawing / document title number(s):

PN-001, Rev 2.0 (3D Existing and Proposed); PN-002, Rev 2.0 (Block and Location Plan); PN-003, Rev 2.0 (Existing Plans); PN-004, Rev 2.0 (Existing Elevations); PN-005, Rev 2.0 (Existing Sections); PN-006, Rev 2.0 (Proposed Plans); PN-007, Rev 2.0 (Ground Floor Proposed Plan); PN-008, Rev 2.0 (Proposed Elevations); PN-009, Rev 2.0 (Proposed Sections); PN-010, Rev 2.0 (Isometric Plans); PN-011, Rev 2.0 (Sectional Perspective); PN-012, Rev 2.0 (Perspectives); PN-013, Rev 2.0 (Site Isometric); Location Plan
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development hereby approved shall be as per those described in the submitted application form and plans listed in Condition 2.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021).
| No part of the flat roofs of the proposed dwellinghouse shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof terrace/garden or similar amenity area.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of occupants of nearby properties and future occupiers of the development, in accordance with policies 7A ,7B and 7D of the Ealing Development Management Plan (2013) and policies D4 and D6 of the London Plan (2021).
